meaningMnemonic: Open your <radical>mouth</radical>. A <radical>tiger</radical> fell in there on some <radical>spikes</radical>! That's what you tell everybody, but when they look in your mouth there's nothing there. It's all a big <kanji>lie</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Lie</kanji> about spikes in your mouth and I'll put soap with spikes in it in your mouth to teach you a lesson. That's why I'm using <reading>u</reading>ni <reading>so</reading>ap (うそ).
